description: Kevin from Forward March 2... Kevin reminds me of a married man that is trying gay sex for the first time. You know the type...so hungry, so curious and so fucking excited that they want to try it all in the first go. ... Kevin becomes a very verbal bottom...saying things to Cole like 'Come on...give it to me. Is that all you got?' At another point he says to Cole, 'You aint got no big dick...come on give me more.' Kevin is an agressive bottom that doesn't fuck around. ... Our new recruit has done something no one else has ever done..he's fucked Cole to exhaustion. Cole has to actually stop during the scene to take a break. While Cole is breaking we are chatting about him having possibly met his match and Kevin just says fuck it. 'Have you got a bigger one?
title: Kevin
